#include <Adafruit_NeoPixel.h>
#ifdef __AVR__
#include <avr/power.h>
#endif

#include <ESP8266WiFi.h>

#define PIN 4
#define NUM_LIGHTS  256

Adafruit_NeoPixel strip = Adafruit_NeoPixel(NUM_LIGHTS, PIN, NEO_GRB + NEO_KHZ800);

typedef struct {
  String key;
  int value[256][3];
} key_value_pair;

const auto empty = new key_value_pair();

};

key_value_pair* value_for(String key) {
  for (auto i = 0; i < sizeof images; i++){
    Serial.println(images[i].key);
    
    if (images[i].key != key) { 
      Serial.println("Key didn't match");
      continue; 
    }

    Serial.println("Key matched!");
    return &images[i];    
  }

  Serial.println("Returning default. Oh no!");
  return empty;
}

void connect_wifi() {
  const char* ssid     = "ilikepie";
  const char* password = "Goldfish54!";

  Serial.print("Connecting to ");
  Serial.println(ssid);
  
  WiFi.begin(ssid, password);
  
  while (WiFi.status() != WL_CONNECTED) {
    delay(500);
    Serial.print(".");
  }
  Serial.println("");
  Serial.println("WiFi connected");  
}

String call_api() {
  const char* host = "christmas-jumper.herokuapp.com";
    
  WiFiClient client;
  const int httpPort = 80;
  if (!client.connect(host, httpPort)) {
    Serial.println("connection failed");
    return "";
  }
  
 // We now create a URI for the request
  String url = "/icon.json";
  
 // This will send the request to the server
  client.print(String("GET ") + url + " HTTP/1.1\r\n" + "Host: " + host + "\r\n" + "Connection: close\r\n\r\n");
  delay(500);
  
 // Read one line of the reply from server
  String icon;
  while(client.available()){
    icon = client.readStringUntil('\r');
  }

  Serial.print("API returned: " + icon);
  return icon;    
}

void print_bytes(String search_key) {
  Serial.print("Search key in print bytes is: " + search_key);
  
  auto kvp = value_for(search_key);
  Serial.print("Found kvp");
  
  for (auto i = 0; i < NUM_LIGHTS; i++) {
    
    auto rgb = kvp->value[i];
    Serial.print("[");
    Serial.print(rgb[0]);
    Serial.print(",");
    Serial.print(rgb[1]);
    Serial.print(",");
    Serial.print(rgb[2]);
    Serial.print("]");
    Serial.print("\r\n");

    strip.setPixelColor(i, strip.Color(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2]));
  }

  Serial.print("Colours set");
}

void setup() {
  strip.begin();
  strip.show(); // Initialize all pixels to 'off';
  Serial.begin(115200);
  connect_wifi();
  auto image = call_api();  
  print_bytes(image);
  delay(100);
}

void loop() {
    strip.show();
   delay(1000);
}
